meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 17
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the final week of April 2021

pageProps.content:
1. Learned about the usage of addon-knob in storybookjs.
  2. Learned about networking improvements in dotnet 5.
  3. Chekhov's gun is a dramatic principle that states that every element in a story must be necessary, and irrelevant elements should be removed.
  4. Learned a bit about the new Http/3 and QUIC protocol.
  5. To view the log of a git repository in reverse order, use the command git log --reverse.
  6. GAVI, officially Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance (previously the GAVI Alliance, and before that the Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization) is a publicâ€“private global health partnership with the goal of increasing access to immunization in poor countries.
